title: CNN - How to use 160,000 images without crashing
description: Introduction In this kernel I will describe a workflow that  allows 160,000 full size images to be used without crashing the kaggle kernel. This is made possible by setting up a directory structure and then using generators to feed the data into the model for training, validation and for prediction. We will train the model using 144,000 images and validate on 16,000 images.
description_lemmatized: introduction kernel describe workflow allows 160000 full size image used without crashing kaggle kernel made possible setting directory structure using generator feed data model training validation prediction train model using 144000 image validate 16000 image
